title: Enough Rope: Can I Write the Ending?
creator_credit: Kerry Brewster, Australian Broadcasting Corporation and Zapruder's Other Films
brief_description: What would you do if you thought you were about to die? This is an inspiring and moving story of three strong women, Annie Robinson, Nadeen Kovacic and Jasmyne Russell, each confronting life’s hardest journey, and how they’ve chosen to face their cancer and its ramifications. Presented by Andrew Denton, first broadcast on ABC Television on September 10, 2007.
